title: coolsv
author: coolsv
content: Have PI coin need usdt only who have huobi US exchange acc can do it.telegram - @Retro6778

comments.author: Chibaba
comments.body: Quote from: coolsv on July 31, 2023, 06:21:44 AMHave PI coin need usdt only who have huobi US exchange acc can do it.telegram - @Retro6778 Is PI transferable cos I guess it was the IOU that was listed on huobi

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Quote from: Chibaba on August 04, 2023, 09:14:42 AMIs PI transferable cos I guess it was the IOU that was listed on huobiNo it's not. OP is just trying to look for a shortcut by trying to sell Pi coins for USDT through people who are trading Pi IOU on Huobi. But this is like transferring his burden to another person, since they can't deposit the coins anywhere to be sold.

comments.author: hovara
comments.body: Quote from: logfiles on August 04, 2023, 10:24:59 PMQuote from: Chibaba on August 04, 2023, 09:14:42 AMIs PI transferable cos I guess it was the IOU that was listed on huobiNo it's not. OP is just trying to look for a shortcut by trying to sell Pi coins for USDT through people who are trading Pi IOU on Huobi. But this is like transferring his burden to another person, since they can't deposit the coins anywhere to be sold.Am I understanding you correct? Pi coins cannot be sold?

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Quote from: hovara on August 07, 2023, 06:28:04 AMAm I understanding you correct? Pi coins cannot be sold?the mined pi coins can not be traded in exchanges because no exchange has listed Pi yet. What you are seeing trading on Huobi are not actual Pi coins, and you can not withdraw them once you have bought them.What you see now is people buying the coins on p2p level but at a much lower price like this guy
